OOC: Mind finding another sphere so Meteara can be truly introduced?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> He walks out and finds Kup and Condor and fills them
> in and then sets off.
> 
> --- Jonathan <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> > > BIC:  Sunhawk gets up and walks to Talos's office.
> > >
> > > Sunhawk:  What do you want me to do, SIR!
> > >
> > 
> > {Talos}
> > 
> >     Talos looked up from the comm when Sunhawk
> > reported for duty, "Kup
> > returned with a sample of very odd and very powerful
> > energon so you'll most
> > likely find him of some use on this mission. Take a
> > team out, use your
> > descretion on who, no more than four including
> > yourself. Take this team out
> > to that source of energon the preds were
> > investigating and do this."
> > 
> >     Turning the computer around showing a small
> > wireframe of the energon
> > sample, "We need our own energon supplies re-stocked
> > and the energon needs
> > to be studied. That's you and your teams job.
> > Information and gathering.
> > Dismissed."
> >
